title: Bubbletea scaffolding
description:
Set up Bubbletea TUI framework with Bubbles components.

Dependencies:
- github.com/charmbracelet/bubbletea
- github.com/charmbracelet/bubbles
- github.com/charmbracelet/lipgloss

internal/tui/tui.go:
- Model struct with tea.Model interface
- Init, Update, View methods
- Embed bubbles: viewport, list, progress

cmd/ticker/main.go:
- Add TUI mode (default when not --headless)
- tea.NewProgram setup

Verify: ticker run <epic> shows blank TUI, exits cleanly with q/ctrl-c
